basic_information.scholarship_name: Judy Leitner Endowed Scholarship in Gerontology

description: This scholarship was established by alumna Patricia Bolt in honor of Mrs. Leitner and awards a graduate student enrolled in the Master of Arts in Gerontology program. Eligibility Requirements Admitted into Master of Arts in Gerontology program Enrolled minimum 3 credit hours Minimum 3.0 GPA and in good standing Oklahoma resident Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded The applicant must provide a written statement of 750 words that describes the applicant's rationale for scholarship merit and intent to work in the field of Gerontology

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Gerontology   or SIS_Major is Gerontology   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Gerontology   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Gerontology
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Gerontology   or SIS_Major is Gerontology   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Gerontology   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Gerontology

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
